alert.note: Alert for Buffalo (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 4:14PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Buffalo County through 445 PM CDT... At 412 PM CDT, the public reported a strong thunderstorm over Fountain City, or near Winona, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Public reported pea sized hail near Bethany and 40 mph wind gusts near Trempealeau at 410 PM. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fountain City around 415 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Marshland, Merrick State Park, Bluff Siding, Dodge and Lock And Dam 5 A. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
